casebody.data:
Town of Wallingford v. Local 1326, IAFF, AFL-CIO, et al. (6903)

Spallone, Daly and Foti, Js.

Submitted on briefs November 7 decision released November 17, 1988 Edward T. Lynch, Jr., filed a brief for the appellant (plaintiff). William Gagne, Jr., and Barbara J. Collins filed a brief for the appellee (named defendant). Joseph I. Lieberman, attorney general, and Richard T. Sponzo and Charles A. Overend, assistant attorneys general, filed a brief for the appellee (defendant Board of Mediation and Arbitration). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
